name: The Tor Project
description: Defend yourself against tracking and surveillance.

projects.summary: A program that allows university students to work on open source projects during the summer with mentoring from experienced contributors.
projects.difficulty: Variable, depending on the specific project and skill level required.

projects.summary: An organization that develops tools to improve privacy and security on the internet, focusing primarily on the Tor network.
projects.difficulty: Varies by project, with some requiring advanced technical skills.
